CustomField.description: If granularity is 'Subperiod', the formula will be applied at subperiod level and merged using merge rule. In 'Period' granularity, the formula will be applied over already merged values.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If granularity is Subperiod, the formula will be applied at subperiod level and merged using merge rule. In Period granularity, the formula will be applied over already merged values.
CustomField.label: Time Granularity
